metadata.title: CVE-2021-34339 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Ming 0.4.8 has an out-of-bounds buffer access issue in the functiongetString() in decompiler.c file that causes a direct segmentation faultand leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
